TEXT: Alyssa hails from Quellstein, a land in Hirudia reserved for the magically gifted. NL She bears the mark of a demon, and is thus sought after by dark forces.
NL You Summon your Blade and charge at the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~marked~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
